text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: While the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe Uma Musume, Montjeu, was pursuing from the outside, from the middle of the course came Special Week!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: On the same stage as the 『Japan Derby』, she's shown us the strength and pride of the Derby Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: All of Japan's hopes and dreams, Special Week has fulfilled them! The huge cheer from the stands are to give praise to that accomplishment!

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: As I thought……the world is quite large.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Montjeu-san……!

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: It was a good race, Special Week.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Montjeu-san, in Japan, there are many other amazing Uma Musume like El-chan, Grass-chan, and me.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That's why, next time, let's all run again together!

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, just how much will Japan's Uma Musume continue to thrill me……

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: ……definitely, once more.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Congratulations, Special Week!!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: It was an amazing race!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: W-what an amazing cheer……

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: What do you expect? You just beat champions that had gathered here from all across the world!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It's probably strange to say this to the participant herself but, I would have liked for you to experience what it was like from the stands.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: After all, the voices cheering for Special Week-san were coming from everyone in the stands.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Those voices, even I heard all of them!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Everyone had expectations for me…… that's why I felt like I had to respond in kind!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: And then, you really did respond to them.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You were really cool……！

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Always giving her all to respond to those expectations……just watching that Spe-chan, makes me want to run in my next race as soon as possible.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'm always being encouraged by Suzuka-san though! Even today, just seeing you again after so long, gave me strength!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: And on top of that……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, thank you very much!
Congratulations, Spe.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe……up until now, I've run in so many races but, this is the first time I've run with so many expectations of me……!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: The reason I was able to respond to all these expectations, is because Trainer-san was always there with me!
Saying that, Special Week had the usual carefree smile on her face.
However, everyone in Japan's expectations―― having splendidly answered the monumentous task of answering all those dreams, it was the most dazzling so far――

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Special Week, congratulations! That was the best! Yo, "Supreme Commander of Japan"! "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……Eh？

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Today's race, I definitely won't forget it! It was really moving! For sure, you are Japan's #1 Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I am…… "Japan's #1"……

text_block_list.name: Sociable Young Man
text_block_list.text: Thanks for winning! Special Week!

text_block_list.name: Serious-looking Young Man
text_block_list.text: Against these strong opponents from overseas…… winning against the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe Uma Musume……

text_block_list.name: Serious-looking Young Man
text_block_list.text: Japan's Uma Musume―― "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" can even take on the world!
The phrase "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" was mentioned many times.
Those words were now being said to her in praise.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I am……to people all across Japan, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer-san……I……Uu……uuu……!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey now, we've got the commemorative photo next, you know? They'll end up getting your crying face.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But…… I'm "Japan's #1" to everyone～……!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uwoo～～nn!! You fulfilled their dreams after all! It's fine to cry, Spe-chaaaaaan!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, I suppose they still can't keep it together……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: However, this scene is very <Sirius>-like.
<Sirius>-like, you say……?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Another person had their dream fulfilled by being on this team.
……Ah, you're right.
……Ah, you're right.
When we first met, Special Week was very unrefined. That part of her might not have really changed much, but……
Her 2 moms, and not just the team's expectations, she fulfilled the expectations of many in Japan, without a doubt she's now "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Were you watching me? Mom……!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I did it! I became "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!
